short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically use AmazonSmile -- Amazon's program to donate to charity with every purchase

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Time To Smile will automatically redirect you to smile.amazon.com when you visit an applicable Amazon webpage. AmazonSmile is Amazon's program that donates 0.5% of sales to your choice of charity. 

Code available (GPL) at https://github.com/sameermanek/TimeToSmile

This extension was not created by or associated with Amazon. Amazon and AmazonSmile are registered trademarks of Amazon.com, Inc.
